name: Historic Downtown Square
description: The heart of our city, featuring beautifully preserved 19th-century architecture, unique boutiques, art galleries, and cozy cafes. A perfect spot for a leisurely stroll and local shopping.

name: City Central Park
description: A sprawling green oasis with walking trails, playgrounds, picnic areas, and a serene lake. Hosts various community events and concerts throughout the year.

name: Passo Fundo Museum of Art & History
description: Explore local history and diverse art collections. Features rotating exhibits from regional artists and engaging educational programs for all ages.

name: Riverside Nature Trail
address: Trailhead at 1 River Rd, Passo Fundo, RS
description: A scenic trail perfect for hiking, biking, and birdwatching along the Passo Fundo River. Offers stunning views and a peaceful escape into nature.

name: The Grand Theatre
description: A beautifully restored historic theatre presenting a variety of live performances, including plays, musicals, concerts, and film screenings.

name: UPF Campus
description: A vibrant academic hub contributing to the local economy and culture. Often open for public lectures, sporting events, and campus tours.

name: Farmer's Market Pavilion
description: Open seasonally, offering fresh local produce, artisanal goods, and a lively community atmosphere. Support local farmers and craftspeople.

name: Old Mill Heritage Site
address: 99 Old Mill Rd, Passo Fundo, RS
description: Discover the industrial past of our region at this preserved historic mill. Offers guided tours and insights into early manufacturing.
